channel.title: Homes on Andrew Xia
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Andrew Xia

item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Hello! I am currently a Fulbright Chile Scholar, working with Prof. Jose Correa at the Universidad de Chile in research in mechanism design and applications in transit networks. I recently completed my masters in Computer Science at MIT advised by Prof. Yael Kalai, with my thesis focused on lattice-based cryptography. In my free time, I like photography, planespotting, running, cycling, and learning languages. I’ve lived and/or worked in USA, Hong Kong, Japan, China, Germany, and Chile so far.

item.title: Publications & Projects

Senseable Cities Lab 2017 Integrated Gene Expression Probabilistic Models for Cancer Staging [pdf] Andrew Xia, Gil Alterovitz JMM 2013 Selected Projects How to Make Almost Anything [link] Took part of the class, built a chair and a PCB, before the semester got too busy :(
